overview: Do you know how the unconscious communicates with you? Can you distinguish your own thought from the thought of another person in your own brain? Can you distinguish truth from lies within yourself? Who is the one talking to you beyond your consent? How do you move from your own survival-oriented truth to the imperishable law of truth – love? Have time to tell yourself the truth. Adaptation of “the gentle one” is a basic way of finding your truth, which had been prescribed by fyodor dostoevsky long before the generally accepted system of sigmund freud.
title: A Gentle Spirit
